home.hero_subtitle: Explore the exquisite collection of contemporary artworks by Bibisora

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I purchase an artwork?
faq.a1: Simply add the artwork to your cart and proceed to checkout. We accept various payment methods.
faq.a2: Yes, we ship worldwide. Shipping costs vary by location.
faq.a3: We offer a 30-day return policy for all artworks in original condition.
faq.q4: Are the artworks original or prints?
faq.a4: Each artwork page specifies whether it's an original piece or a limited edition print.
faq.q5: How do I care for my artwork?
faq.a5: Keep artwork away from direct sunlight and moisture. Dust gently with a soft cloth.
